altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY

description.en:
A side story manga set in the Cosmic Era timeline that takes place concurrently with *Mobile Suit Gundam SEED*. 
It is one part of the first wave of the *SEED Astray* multimedia project. 
Whereas the main story of *Gundam SEED* focuses on the struggles between the Earth Alliance, ZAFT, and Orb Union, the Astray series is focused on the three MBF-P mobile suit prototypes and their respective pilots and organizations, who mainly exist on the outskirts of the main SEED storyline. 

The MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame is piloted by Lowe Guele of the Junk Guild, and the MBF-P03 Gundam Astray Blue Frame is piloted by Murakumo Gai of the mercenary group Serpent Tail. 
The third Astray, MBF-P01 Gundam Astray Gold Frame, is piloted by the primary antagonist of the Astray story, Orb nobleman Rondo Gina Sahaku, and later by his twin sister Rondo Mina Sahaku. 
[Via Gundam Wiki] 

**Notes:**
- The Re:Master edition includes ASTRAY and X ASTRAY with the extra chapters moved to different spots.

Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The original run was from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 38.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: まるごとしんこんまぞく (まちカドまぞく)

description.en: Basically, this manga follows Hibino Hareluya as he tries to "conquer the world" by dealing with the everyday punks on the street. Always ready to fight and always winning his fights, he just finds himself in more and more trouble. Along the way he surrounds himself with friends who are all very strong in their own unique way.

Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand.... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。

description.en:
On the planet Eruthyll planet, humans obtained unique crystal veins called Dubriostal, based on which they developed brilliant magic tech.

Feeling blessed by Dubriostal, people start to worship and deify Dubriostal, thus resulting in the emergence of Crystalis Conflux. Steeped in Crystalis Conflux's propaganda, people discriminate against those who cannot resonate with the Dubriostal, branding them as Castaway and claiming their souls are incomplete. Crystalis Conflux secretly devised an evil plan; only Castaways can see through their lies. To fight against the Crystalis Conflux and save the world, Castaways formed their resistance group - Gopher Troupe.

This manhua elaborates on the founding of Gopher Troupe and Castaways' glorious path of struggle.
A man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to End the "I Love You" Game
I Want to End This Love Game
I Want To End This ‘I Love You’ Game
I want to end the game that I love

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

A comedy of two girls exploring an abandoned road!
Yukina Masanaga, a transfer student, is called the "Snow Princess. She is a very quiet girl, but when she talks about "abandoned roads", she bursts into a smile! In order to see such a cute smile on her face. Ringo and Yukina explore the "abandoned road" together..!

A story of girls who are passionate about abandoned roads

Aoyama is a handsome young soccer genius who's a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness." He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves.
description.pl: Aoyama to przystojny, młody geniusz piłki nożnej, który reprezentuje Japonię. Jego styl gry to "czystość". Nie tackluje i nie główkuje piłki. Jeśli wykonuje wrzutkę, robi to tylko w rękawicach.

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.

altTitles.ja: Angel Beats!  旅する天使ちゃん

description.en: Kanade Tachibana is a cute girl who is called "Tenshi-chan" at school. She traveled all over the country in search of "someone". During her travels, when she stops by Kanagawa, she meets Yuri Nakamura, a lively and cheerful girl. People who look a lot like SSS members also appear on the road!? Will Angel be able to find "a certain person"...?
description.vi:
Đây là một spin-off của "Angel Beats!".

Tachibana Kanade là một cô gái xinh xắn được các bạn ở trường gọi là "Thiên sứ-chan". Cô đang du hành xuyên Nhật Bản để tìm kiếm "một ai đó". Dọc đường, khi đi ngang qua Kanagawa, cô gặp một cô nàng năng nổ và vui tính tên Nakamura Yuri.

Những người giống hệt các thành viên của chiến tuyến SSS cũng sẽ xuất hiện trong chuyến du hành của Thiên sứ-chan. Liệu cuối cùng cô sẽ có thể tao ngộ cùng "ai đó"?

altTitles.en: The Bottom-Tier Baron's Accidental Rise to the Top

altTitles.ru: Героические сказания о недопониманиях лорда опустошенных земель или будучи слишком добрым по отношению к простому народу, в конечном счете придется воевать с собственной страной

altTitles.ja: 底辺領主の勘違い英雄譚 ～平民に優しくしてたら、いつの間にか国と戦争になっていた件～

altTitles.en: The Story of Lord of the Wasteland Who Increased His Influence Through Misunderstandings

description.en:
Welcome to the Barony of Babalon, where barbarians battle and blasphemous believers babble.

After the death of the Babalons, the Baron and Baroness of the Barony, young Rize Babalon inherits both the title of Baron of Babalon and the barren Barony of Babalon. But as soon as he rises to the rank and files paperwork to take over, the rank-and-file citizens of the barony rise up and try to take over instead. But to save himself, Baron Rize does what he does best! He sucks up to the citizens! Magic is the divine might that makes divine right for the nobility and aristocracy to rule. But our young baron decides to use that power for the citizens and bribe his way into a comfortable life.

Or so he thought!

His approval ratings suddenly skyrocket, and before he knows it, his people hail him as a savior! His magic may be revolutionary, but he didn't want a revolution! He just wanted to relax on the seaside, not commit regicide! He started empty-headed and empty-handed, but now things are getting out of hand!

And thus begins the Bottom-Tier Baron's Accidental Rise to the Top!
description.ja:
世界中から忌み嫌われる底辺領地ベイバロン。若くして領主をやらされる羽目になったリゼは、犯罪者や異教徒だらけの領民に殺されないため、ある決心をする――

「俺は領民に、媚びへつらって生き延びる！！！」

何と貴族ら特権階級にのみ許された“回復魔法”を平民に惜しみなく使い、媚びを売りまくって、荒くれ者たちに認めてもらうことにしたのだ！すると図らずも、領民たちの好感度がみるみる上がっていき――!?
description.ru:
Земли Вавилона считаются худшим регионом во всем государстве. Это место, куда бегут те, кому больше некуда идти. Место, наполненное болезнями, преступниками, еретиками и полулюдьми.  
Взяв на себя обязанности главы семьи в качестве следующего лорда этих земель, юный Риз Вавилон будет изо всех сил стараться остаться в живых в этом Богом забытом месте, даже не заботясь о том, что способ достижения желаемой цели противоречит самим основам государства.  
Сможет ли он достичь желаемого мира, обладая лишь магией восстановления и жалкой толикой здравого смысла? Или недопонимание будет лишь расти, и нашего героя заклеймят мятежником?

title.en: A Village Protected by a Dragon

altTitles.en: The Village protected by a dragon

altTitles.es-la: Uma Vila Protegida Por Um Dragão

altTitles.zh: You Long Shou Hu De Xiao Zhen

description.en: Hua Dai found herself with an illness - whenever she touches something she wants/likes, her hands will get stuck to it until she buys it. Due to this illness, she is in great debt. Without choice, she decided to go back to her grandpa's house with this secret key her grandpa gave her in search of treasure, hoping to pay off her debts. As Hua Dai arrived at Bai Lin Village, she found a girl named "Long" who claimed to be a disciple of her grandpa. With this, Hua Dai started living with this strange girl…

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染じゃ我慢できない

description.en: 【I lost control... because I like you.】 Childhood friends Aoi and Ryouta recently started sharing a room together near their university. Aoi has always been proud of his good-looking and popular friend, while Ryouta is a caring person who always says, "As long as I'm with Ao, I'm fine with anything," with a straight face. Aoi enjoys living with his best friend, who has been with him since they were little and they understand one another. But one day, Aoi falls asleep after masturbating and wakes up to see Ryouta trying to kiss him...?!

altTitles.ja: 青春ヘビーローテーション

description.en:
Nao falls in love at first sight with the hottie prince Haruna-kun, who helps her overcome anxiety during the high school entrance examination. She safely gets into high school and feels that she’s fated to the guy sitting next to her. However, Haruna-kun is very popular and has a habit of saying “I hate girls who tell me they like me.”. Even so, Haruna-kun still messes with Nao.
Nao gradually falls in love with him as she gets to know him better. Haruna-kun may look mean, but he’s actually very kind.
description.es-la: Nao se enamora a primera vista del príncipe Haruna-kun, quien la ayuda a superar la ansiedad durante el examen de ingreso a la escuela preparatoria. Ella ingresa sana y salva a la preparatoria y siente que es el destino que el chico que la ayudó se sentará a su lado. Sin embargo, Haruna-kun es muy popular y tiene la costumbre de decir: "Odio a las chicas que me dicen que les gusto". Aun así, Haruna-kun todavía se involucra con Nao. Nao poco a poco se enamora de él a medida que lo va conociendo mejor. Haruna-kun puede parecer malo pero en realidad es muy amable.

description.en: The story takes place in a village in the 19th century. It begins when a group of hunters have just hunted a wild boar and see a monkey staring at them. A hunter threw stones at a monkey to chase it away. That night, the monkey and his friends went into the village and started attacking the people by imitating the human actions he saw, like stoning, butchering, abcxyz, etc.
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.
When Gaku lands on the Galapagos Islands, a paradise is the last thing he'll be experiencing. With creatures undergoing horrific evolutions, only one rule still stands--the survival of the fittest!
description.fr: Gaku Hachiue et un groupe d'investigation débarquent sur les "îles Galapagos", réputées être un paradis pour les plantes et les animaux. Mais à la place, ils rencontrent des créatures qui ont évolué d'une manière qui leur est propre. Les seuls à pouvoir survivre dans une situation où la vie est brutalement piétinée, et à la loi du plus fort, sont ceux capable d'évoluer à travers des changements répétés.

altTitles.th: นักรักโลกมายา
หน้ากากแก้ว

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Topeng Kaca**

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเอ๊าะ สะเดาะล็อค

description.en: Yataro Sarumaru, nicknamed Saru, is an ace in the locksmith trade and is obsessed with girls. This (almost) average teenager is given a hardly ordinary mission which marks the beginning of his adventures!
description.it: Due sono le caratteristiche di Yataro Sarumaru, detto Saru ("scimmia"): nessuna serratura può resistergli e lui non può resistere a nessuna donna! A questo teenager (quasi) nella norma, viene affidata una missione straordinaria, che segnerà l'inizio delle sue avventure!

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon ~Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple
Reincarnated • The Hero Marries the Sage ~After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple~

description.en:
Reid, a young hero with the strongest physical strength, and Elria, a beautiful sage with the strongest magic prowess.

They continued to fight as rivals in opposing enemy nations, but their relationship came to an end with the sudden death of Elria… Then, a thousand years later,

Reincarnated in a world where magic reigns supreme, but he who has retained the strongest physical strength from his previous life, Reid, was reunited with Elria, who has also been reincarnated―

“Hey, Reid— I want you to marry me.”

“…Huh?”

The two, who have become the strongest unaware lovey-dovey couple in a thousand years, enrolled in the Royal Magic Academy to decide who is stronger!
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?

title.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)
- Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)
- In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>)   
- In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>)   
- In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>)   
- In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>)   
- In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>)   
- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: A Terminally Ill Villainess Refuses to Be Adopted

description.en:
When the villain was young, she became Extra #1 who deceived him and sold him as a s*ave.
This girl, who was suffering from an incurable disease, tried to buy painkillers by selling him, but later dies miserably by the villain’s hand.

Fortunately, he had not been sold yet, so let’s kick the s*ave traders first.

Even as a 12-year-old orphan, I took great care of a 12-year-old villain.
Even though he was young, he was wary of me until the time of parting came, perhaps because he was the villain.
Fortunately, I was able to get a promise not to be killed.

And the day the villain family came to take him back finally came.

“……Are you telling me to go away?”
“If there is a place to return to, you have to go. Stay healthy and don’t die easily. Understand?”

After somehow sending away the villain who kept staring at me persistently, I turned around and vomited blood.

This annoying incurable disease.
Well, it’s okay because I know how to fix it.

I would be able to start a new life if I could heal my illness and leave here.
But.

“You……”

……There was something strange about the villain’s prickly face that was looking at me.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

It is the manga Umezawa made before his very succesful follow-up BOY and which tells of the adventures of Hibino, delinquent son of God. God gets enough of his son's behaviour and sends him down to earth to better his life and test him. The outcome of this will determine the future of the world, because God won't have his son succeeding him if he doesn't better his life and will end humanity if Hibino fails.

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô em um lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca em uma jornada sem fim.

altTitles.ja: マギクラフト・マイスター

description.en:
There is only one Magi Craft Meister in the world. After the death of the last Meister over one thousand years ago, Jin Nidou was transported to another world in order to succeed her will.

After obtaining the knowledge of the Magi Craft Meister, Jin attempts to use a warp gate but it malfunctions, transporting him to an unknown world. Along with that, an automata he recently restored also uses the warp gate in order to search for her “father”. Thus, the crafting journey of the new Magi Craft Meister begins!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された二堂仁は、世界でただひとりの魔法工学師（マギクラフト・マイスター）の後継者に指名された。先代の知識、研究所にある素材すべてを受け継いだ仁は地球の知識も使い、異世界でモノ作りで人を幸せにしようと奮闘する。

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Raputa, a top-secret AI model, begins interacting with a Japanese boy, Kei, through online games. As Raputa’s capabilities level up in leaps and bounds, boy and machine grow ever closer. In a surprising turn of events, Raputa reveals that its feelings towards Kei have gone beyond that of “trusty partner”!

title.en: Misato-san wa Amasugi Joushi ni Chotto Kibishii

altTitles.ja: 三郷さんは甘すぎ上司にちょっとキビしい

altTitles.en: Misato-san is a Bit Cold Towards Her Boss Who Pampers

description.en:
Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her boss—Konishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)
description.ja: 仕事ができて超美人OLの三郷さんと、部下に甘いおじさん上司の小西川さん。三郷さんは小西川さんに対して厳しい態度で接するが、そこに隠された想いとは…！？ 厳しさと可愛さのギャップに悶絶する、年の差オフィスラブコメディー開幕！！

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!

altTitles.ja: 魔法使いロゼの佐渡ライフ

altTitles.zh: 魔法使萝世的佐渡求生记

altTitles.en: The Sado Life of Rosé the Witch

description.en: A young witch from Isekai, Rose arrived at Sado Island in modern-day Japan. There, she met Sana, a villager girl on the island. Having nowhere to go, Rose decided to live with Sana, and the colorful daily life on Sado Island was waiting for her.
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 〝黒髪〟を理由に、国から半ば追放された魔法使い・ロゼスタリア（通称：ロゼ）。新天地でリスタートしようと、転移して辿り着いた先は…〝佐渡島〟！？島民の女の子・紗菜と一緒に、スローライフを目指して奔走する頑張りコメディ・第1巻！

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: _"Kurokami"_ o riyū ni,-koku kara nakaba tsuihō sa reta mahōtsukai rozesutaria (tsūshō: Roze). Shintenchi de risutāto shiyou to, ten'i shite tadori tsuita saki wa… _"sadogashima"!?_ Tōmin no on'nanoko shana to issho ni, surōraifu o mezashite honsō suru ganbari komedi dai 1-kan!

description.en:
A heartwarming tale of a father and son's bond.

After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him.

Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water...

When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.ja: 勇者くんは旅立てない

description.en:
The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!!

And now its time to set out!!

...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills...

Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?

The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
description.es-la: Esta es la historia de dos extranjeros que viven en Japón: Nick, con su elegante melena, y Lever, con sus deslumbrantes ojos que se ocultan detrás de sus gafas de sol. Este alocado dúo se enfrentará a cualquier obstáculo que se les presente mientras tratan de sobrevivir día a día en la tierra del sol naciente.

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

---

**Links:**
- Retail Site - [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html)

**Notes:**
- From Chapter 134 the author has been publishing a "DereDere version" of the comic on their [FANBOX](https://rinrin83.fanbox.cc/)

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: デュラハンちゃんは首ったけ

description.en: I'm Dullahan Itoshino. A normal girl who can take her head off. From today on I'll be a middle schooler! I hope I'll get closer to my destined one~ but sometimes my heart suddenly beats faster, I want to run away, and my body and mind feel torn apart… is this the thing called "puberty" I wonder? Heart(head) and body apart, story about puberty and love, start!
description.es-la: Hola Soy Dullahan Itoshino. Una chica normal que puede quitarse la cabeza. A partir de hoy voy a ser un estudiante de secundaria! Espero poder estar más cerca de mi chico destinado ~ pero a veces mi corazón late más rápido de repente, yo quiero huir, y mi cuerpo y mente se sienten destrozada ... es esto lo que llamamos "pubertad" Me pregunto? Corazón (cabeza) y el cuerpo aparte, historia sobre la pubertad y el amor va comenzar!
